g.text: The HAP shall provide continuous Earth
sensoring payloads to monitor and detect
The HAP shall provide maritime surveillance
using radar and optical sensors for coastal
The HAP shall support tracking of animal
The HAP shall be capable of detecting and
The HAP shall measure and analyze
The total structural mass of the HAP shall
The HAP shall integrate a photovoltaic
system as a primary power source.
The HAP shall include rechargeable battery
systems to ensure power availability during
The HAP shall operate reliably in an ambient
The HAP shall maintain flight operations at
an altitude of 20 kilometers within the
The HAP shall not exceed a maximum
The wingspan of the HAP shall not exceed
